name: Contributor: Hamyar Programming Team
author: Hamyar Programming Team

sections.description:
Hamyar Ticketing System has written by Hamyar Programming team , it is a real powerful ticketing system.

** with this plugin you can manage all of the tickets

Features

1-Ticket form will be import with shot code : [hamyar_ticket]
2-Full Ajax !
3-With search ability
4-No registration needed
5-Tickets are protected with password
6-Both admin and user can close tickets
7-After Ticket creation admin and user both will recive email
8-Jalali date for Iranian users!
sections.installation:
1. Extract the downloaded archive in ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory
    2-Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
3.0

  • Improved ajax

3.1

  • Improved securitry code
  • Improved close ticket

3.2

  • Bug fixes

3.3

  • Bug fixes

3.4

  • In new version you can include jquery or stop jquery codes in your template
  • With this ability you can use this plugin even if your server does’nt support short tag

3.4.1

  • The problem of showing ticket is solved

3.4.1.1

  • The problem of showing ticket is solved

3.4.1.2

  • Coordinated with php 5.5
  • Plugin is optimized

short_description: Hamyar Ticketing System is a simple and powerful ticketing system for wordpress websites.
